Title: Relates to reckless assault of a child by a parent, guardian or other person legally charged with the child's care and endangering the welfare of a child
Summary: Relates to reckless assault of a child by a parent, guardian or other person legally charged with the child's care and endangering the welfare of a child.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law and the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to reckless assault of a child by a parent, guardian or other person legally charged with the child's care and endangering the welfare of a child
